website_summaries.verdict: A water-like spray that removes unwanted elements and makes your produce look great.
pros: Uses a water and anion-based formula to give you a safe product for both organic and conventional produce
Relatively easy to use with a standard spray bottle
cons: It's a newer product with less of a track record
It's not guaranteed to remove all contaminants (like e. coli), and a rinse with regular water is still recommended

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Use this on everything since covid 19 but you never know who might have sneezed in their hand and picked up that vegetable you just bought and put it back down because they didn’t want it. Should have been doing this all along. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kase

customer_reviews.title: Not an effective cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the effectiveness of this product. I wasn’t even sure if the fruits and vegetables that I sprayed were clean. I bought this product as a last resort, I was searching for: Triple Action Fruit & Veggie wash.
customer_reviews.author: MARSHALL A KING

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it to wash veggies and fruits before eating. I like that it doesn't leave a taste as I've felt with other products. I bought a 3 bottle pack, I think it is a very good deal for the amount paid. I plan on keep on purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Barahona

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It's basically salt water. Doesn't clean produce any better than salt water. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. It's just that two bottles were damaged in shipping. Leaked a little in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor review!!!! One of the spray bottles was broken and leaking and was only about an eighth full. I would like one new bottle to replace the broken one.
customer_reviews.author: dan schoen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Make a trip to Trader Joe’s (stand outside in line) and buy their veggie wash. It feels like I’m spraying water. Don’t buy. It was too late for me to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Just use tap water
customer_reviews.text: Literally is just water. There’s better vegan soaps which will actually clean your food and get pesticides and dirt off. This isn’t special. Tap water works just as good
customer_reviews.author: amelia feigner

customer_reviews.title: But fit instead
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I sprayed blueberries then rinsed— they still were completely covered with that weird hazy stuff. I sprayed again with fit veggie wash and it took it all off.
customer_reviews.author: anna comini

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and one empty bottle
customer_reviews.text: Product and shipping container arrived damaged. One bottle was broken and empty and everything was wet.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Garza

customer_reviews.title: It’s water
customer_reviews.text: It’s literally water. I paid for bottled water. This is 99.7% water.
customer_reviews.author: readerEMS

customer_reviews.title: What a hoax - this is just water....
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the label more carefully; it does say on the back label 'Looks like Water? It is Water!' Most likely completely ineffective for removing viruses from fruit and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Annet Dragavon

customer_reviews.title: It’s water
customer_reviews.text: I usually use a different veggie wash but gave this a try. It basically does nothing. This does not remove wax or dirt like my usual spray at all. May as well just use water if you’re going to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: I like the no order scent.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I’m not sure if the product is working. It’s hard to tell, but in my mind, l feel I’m cleaning my fruits and veggies. I like that it doesn’t have a smell to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Leto

customer_reviews.title: I use this several times a day
customer_reviews.text: It cleans my produce nicely. Fits on the counter next to my dish soap nicely without taking up space so I leave it out all the time.
customer_reviews.author: M.  J. Von Tilzer

customer_reviews.title: Not Trilled
customer_reviews.text: Somehow it feels as though I purchased three spray bottles of water. Then again, it's "aqua."
customer_reviews.author: Donna Marino

product_meta.title: vegeAQUA Fruit and Veggie wash 10.6 fl oz, (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description:
What is the most thing you love for Fruit and Veggie?

I adore the sweet scent and feel that crunching in my mouth. But what if it seems dirty or too waxy? Drop my appetite.

Ever wondered if your fruit and veggie were clean after washing it? What about the wax, soils, or any other contaminants from customers at the market?

These kinds of thoughts are keep coming to my head. 

So what I did? What did we do? Make tasteless, odorless, foam-less safe ingredients fruit and veggie wash vegeAQUA.

You can think "It seems like just water." 

After finding out the ingredients (Anion water 99.7% + Minerals 0.3%), you can think " It is the water." 

Yeah, we know some of you can think anion water is the same as the water in many ways. 

But we can say sure that vegeAQUA is not just water.

Using patent technology, vegeAQUA can be made without any harmful chemical but with a powerful cleaning effect. 

It can remove the contaminants within a minute without an effort. 

Spray directly to fresh produce → Wait 1 min. → Rinse with running water, and Voila looks at the fresh cleaned fruit and veggie.

※ vegeAQUA can be found at the Whole Foods Market too!
feature_bullets: Tasteless, Odorless, Foam-less. Not Spoiling the Natural Scent & Taste.
Registered by Vegan Society. No Animal Test. Non-Animal Derived Ingredients. Safe Ingredients.
Easy to Use: 1.Spray on the Entire Surface, 2.Wait 1 min, 3.Rinse with Running Water. Save a Lot of Time When Prepping for Meals.
It's for Everyone. Whom Eat Fresh Produce Frequently, Raising Children, Vegetarian and on.
Remove Contaminants from the Ground and Someone Else from the Market.
